DataElement.preferredName: AUDIT 9 Have You or Someone Else Been Injured Because of Your Drinking Score Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether a person or someone else has been injured as a result of their drinking.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test Have You or Someone Else Been Injured Because of Your Drinking Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A patient-reported assessment developed by the World Health Organization (WHO) as a simple method of screening for excessive drinking. It can help in identifying excessive drinking as the cause of the presenting illness._A question about whether an individual or someone else has been injured because of the individual's drinking.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test Have You or Someone Else Been Injured Because of Your Drinking
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A patient-reported assessment developed by the World Health Organization (WHO) as a simple method of screening for excessive drinking. It can help in identifying excessive drinking as the cause of the presenting illness._A question about whether an individual or someone else has been injured because of the individual's drinking.

Concepts.definition: A patient-reported assessment developed by the World Health Organization (WHO) as a simple method of screening for excessive drinking. It can help in identifying excessive drinking as the cause of the presenting illness.

Concepts.longName: Have You or Someone Else Been Injured Because of Your Drinking
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual or someone else has been injured because of the individual's drinking.

Property.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Yes, but Not in Last Year
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something has occurred, but not in the last year.

Concepts.longName: Yes, but Not in Last Year
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something has occurred, but not in the last year.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something has occurred during the last year.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something has occurred during the last year.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
